quote_first: I was trying to think. Queer sensations came over me. I looked at my watch. It was
quote_last:
. Donovan was right: it couldn’t be morning. A sudden thought struck me.
“It’s the northern lights, Donovan!” I exclaimed.
title: Left on Labrador
author: Charles Asbury Stephens

quote_last: !” Linden frantically seized hold of a pair of steps and began wandering about the room with them.
title: The Ragged Trousered Philanthropists
author: Robert Tressell
